alreadySynced.title: Already Synced

invalidCode.title: Invalid Code
invalidCode.description:
That code does not exist.

Make sure you copied the exact code you got in Minecraft.
If you have lost your code, just run the sync command in game again.

codeUsed.title: Used Code
codeUsed.description:
That code has already been used by another player!
If you believe this is a mistake, unsync in Minecraft using /unsync and resync your account!

successful.title: Successfully Synced
successful.description:
You have successfully synced your Minecraft account to Discord!
 **Name**: {player}

notSynced.title: Not Synced
notSynced.description: Your account is not synced to the Minecraft Server.

successfulUnsync.title: Successfully Un-Synced
successfulUnsync.description: Your account has been unlinked from the Minecraft Server.
